name: article-manager
description: Full-stack TypeScript article management system for AI agents

scripts.dev: bun run dev:backend & bun run dev:frontend
scripts.build:frontend: bun run build:icons && bun build src/frontend/App.tsx --outdir=public --target=browser --minify --splitting --format=esm --entry-naming=[dir]/[name].[hash].[ext] --chunk-naming=[name].[hash].[ext] && bun run build:html && bun run build:css
scripts.setup-hooks:
test -d .git && echo '#!/bin/sh
bun run typecheck' > .git/hooks/pre-commit && chmod +x .git/hooks/pre-commit || exit 0
